room_title: Escape room "Power Surge" by Escape Garden State in New York
review: Did the Power Surge room today with three adults and one tween and it was fantastic. Very clever, well-designed, and challenging without being frustrating. We didn’t escape but get very far and probably would have finished with another 10 minutes. Can’t wait to go back to try their other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Power Surge" by Escape Garden State in New York
review: Amanda was a great host. My husband and I booked a private room (Power Surge) with our siblings. The puzzles were clever and we were able to escape. We are definitely interested in their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Power Surge" by Escape Garden State in New York
review: My family went out for my mom’s birthday and we did the Power Surge room. It was our first time and it was so much fun! The staff was great and the best part was we worked together and made it out! Highly recommend going here.

room_title: Escape room "Power Surge" by Escape Garden State in New York
review: We chose the Power Surge room. So much fun! Can't wait to go again. Matt was a nice guy. Helped us a bunch. Go if you get a chance!
